title: ‘Rubbing is Racing’: How Pidcock Squeezed Past Koretzky to Conjure Up Epic Olympic Comeback
content:
Gold-medal alchemist: Tom Pidcock's stunning revival seals Olympic repeat in cross-country thriller vs. Koretzky.

Read the full article at ‘Rubbing is Racing’: How Pidcock Squeezed Past Koretzky to Conjure Up Epic Olympic Comeback on Velo.
author: ahood
